text: Ether Ore is the latest solo album from one of the Chapman Stick frontrunners, Greg Howard. Containing tracks recorded live over a period of several months, it manages to bring Greg's strong sense of improvisation across, into the ears of the listener. ==Track listing== *"The First Day" - 2:09 *"Ether Ore" - 11:03 *"Tim Was Here" - 1:56 *"Neptune's Wake" - 9:27 *"Snow Falling on Eno" - 2:59 *"Freedom of Expansion" - 25:33 *"Deep Field Calling" - 3:08 == Personnel == *Greg Howard - Chapman Stick ==References== ==External links== * Category:2005 albums Category:Greg Howard (musician) albums
title: Ether Ore
